titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that all members of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence and all members of the Subcommittee on Defense of the Committee on Appropriations have security clearances.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 3/30/2006--Introduced. Amends rule X (Organization of Committees) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that all members of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence and all members of the Subcommittee on Defense of the Committee on Appropriations have security clearances (to be renewed at least every four years).
